## PyPI Name CLI

> Check whether a package name is available on PyPI

## Install

```
$ pip install pypi_name_cli
```

## Usage

```
$ pypi yoginth

 ðŸ˜ž This name is already taken

$ pypi not_a_package

 ðŸ˜Š This name is available to use
```
